fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
* Environmental legislation 
* Agricultural and food safety legislation including CAP, fertilizers, PPPs, food, feed, etc.  
* Chemical regulation, including REACH 
* Science advice for policy
goals__remit: Prospero & Partners is a management consultancy that helps food and agriculture organizations create value sustainably. We help clients fulfil their untapped potential with fresh approaches to strategy & sustainability, leadership & engagement and culture & change. Since 1999, our integrated consultancy services have been helping some of the world’s leading organizations to cultivate change and harvest value.
relevant_communication:
* Drafting position papers, background documents, newsletters and other communications for clients 
* Representing clients to EU officials and MEPs 
* Acting as the secretariat for client trade associations who are also registered in the Transparency Registry
customers: European Biostimulants Industry Council# European Consortium of the Organic-Based Fertilizers Industry
